Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
Alot of people do use this with work so we want to not be pinging them with non work messages. 

@plazma won't work with your own KMD address.   The balance sheet is server side rectified occasionally.   I.E.   tips aren't sent in TX each timee we send them, rather they are sent in bulk.
